Definition: Otobeas for Smart Transportation Technology and Electronic Payments is a software company specialized in the field of land transportation in general. It is a limited liability company established in 2021 .

AboutUsQuestion.Answer: Otobeas.com platform was established as the first platform of its kind in Egypt to book inter-governorate land bus tickets through the website and mobile phone applications and provide an easy and safe service to passengers. The platform is an advanced booking system that acts as a link between land transport companies (service provider) and passengers (end user). The system enables the management, organization and digitization of the process of booking travel tickets and collecting for the service of land transport companies participating in the platform. It also provides passengers with services to search for trips, compare prices, choose seats, book directly, pay via the Internet and mobile phone applications through the "Otobeas" platform .
Providing the best service to the customer and dealing with transparency and honesty .. Implementing ideas on the ground and making them come true no matter the cost .

• Book one-way or round-trip tickets .
  • Change the appointment without going to the station .
  • Cancel the trip and refund the tickets value in the Otobeas wallet to book again with any service provider (another transportation company) .
  • Booking for others such as friends or relatives .
  • Multiple payment methods .
  • Variable offers and discounts on travel trips .
AboutUsQuestion.Header: Features of the ticket booking service via the Otobeas.com platform

AboutUsQuestion.Answer: Developing a platform that includes all land, group and tourist passenger transport services .
Developing and fully digitizing the land transport sector .
